import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { FormBuilder, FormGroup, Validators } from '@angular/forms'; import { HttpClient } from '@angular/common/http'; @Component({ selector: 'app-home', templateUrl: './home.component.html' }) export class HomeComponent implements OnInit { eventos: any[] = []; menuAberto = false; constructor(private http: HttpClient) {} ngOnInit(): void { this.http.get('/assets/eventos.json').subscribe(data => { this.eventos = data; }); } }
